name: Dreaming Bot(LD51)
description:
Another game made for LudumDare

Dreaming Bot is a story about a bot that have a dream to have new paint job.

He need to work hard to earn enough coins to be able to buy one for himself.

Controls:

MovementInteractionKeyboardWSAD/ARROWSSPACEJoystickLEFT THUMBSTICKY

Game made for Ludum Dare 51
